long_prompt: A teal-colored banjo with a dark wood neck and body, adorned with a shiny silver pickguard, rests gently on a soft, cream-colored blanket beside a rustic wooden table, its vibrant hue contrasting with the muted surroundings.
A sleek, teal-colored banjo with a glossy finish rests on a polished wooden stool in a cozy music studio, its intricate fretwork glinting in the soft, golden light of a nearby window.
A vibrant teal banjo with a wooden body and metal strings rests against a rustic wooden wall, its strings glinting in the soft morning light filtering through the gaps in the weathered wooden planks.
